title: Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       Erie Canalway communities welcome people of all abilities to explore and experience all that the canal has to offer.   The Erie Canalway Trail is fully accessible for adaptive cycling. To get a sense of what the trail is like for riders with special needs, visit Our Ability and view its video Journey Along the Erie Canal.    Adaptive paddling and boat tours are available in multiple locations. Contact us for a copy of our latest visitor map and guide for information on locations.   Most canal-related museums and heritage sites are also accessible.    We recommend contacting sites you plan to visit in advance to be sure that they can accommodate your specific needs.
